Reviews.Title: Nice utility connector for low voltage wiring
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: A lot of 12 volt stuff seems to be using this size connector.  I am using them to wire 12 volt DC LED fixtures.  This is the male connector.  The female is here:CCTV Camera 2.1x5.5mm Female Power Adapter 10 PcsI find these connectors pair well with this wire:DIY 18/2 100 Feet In Wall Speaker Wire Spool CL2 Rated UL ListedAlthough its marketed as speaker wire, I find it ideal for 12 volt LED lighting wire.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Brice
Reviews.Content: These terminal ends are exactly what I was in need of in order to make connections with small gauge wires going to D/C powered devices. I use them mainly for CCTV cameras and IR illuminators as well as various other gadgets that require an A/C adaptor.  I am using a multi port power supply in order to do away with the multitude of adaptors that require a 120VAC outlet in order to get power.These connectors are easy to use and they make a tight connection that doesn't easily pull out.These connectors do not require wire nuts, solder, or any other additional electrical hardware.

Reviews.Title: Great Price - for security cameras and R/C FPV equipment
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The price is great, and while these are often used for security camera power connections, they are also standard for a lot of Remote Control (R/C) First Person View (FPV) equipment.i.e. often used for the ground station equipment running on 12V DC: remote video receivers, diversity equipment...I find it particularly well adapted for that R/C usage as the length of the cables can vary quite a lot depending on the antennas position, and it's super fast to attach a cable to that connector.I found the "+" marking to be connected to the center contact on the batch I received. As I wanted to make these center positive, that worked great.In all cases, please check with a multi-meter to see what post connects to center, and what polarity your equipment requires. [measure twice, cut once would be more like measure twice, avoid smoking your electronic equipment).

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Baxter
Reviews.Content: I just discovered these. They are great for converting tunnel power connectors to screw terminals. Bough a few to test, but will be getting more.

Reviews.Title: Some had short-circuited
Reviews.Author: Whatthe?
Reviews.Content: I have had a few of these that shorted out on me. Sure it was a pain when I found the first one during installation (out of the box as it were). But if that wasn't odd enough, I have had two more do this AFTER the system had been up for awhile (one 2 weeks after installation - and another, "3 months after" installation). They were simply shorted completely upon arriving onsite when servicing them.In most applications this may merely take out the fuse for that given camera channel, but in my case I had an added problem where my 8 Amp PSU would shutdown the whole 8-channel board in the PSU - bringing down all cameras!Worried this may happen again at any time for all I know. I'm disappointed. Makes my camera product look bad. Others here have commented that they had issues with these too - but didn't say how they were bad really - perhaps it was a bad production - a batch that went out by mistake only???I can only tell you my situation... a complete short of the terminals, with zero Ohms still today - when testing them after I had replaced them.

Reviews.Title: power connector
Reviews.Author: don shelton
Reviews.Content: These are very nice connectors.They seem very well made and are easy to use.You can use them for most any low power, low voltage applaction.

Reviews.Title: Works with 3528 LED Strip.
Reviews.Author: Zen
Reviews.Content: I needs male DC power jack adapters to hook up a 12V battery Adapter (8x 1.5v AA batteries in Series) to power my 3528 LED strip.Worked like a charm.The screw down screws were a bit tricky to use as I was slipping in 22 gauge wire and had to fold the ends to make it thicker so the Screw can hold the wire down.The screw when "screwed" pushes down a metal sheet inside that clips or bites the wire.THere are + and - signs on top to indicate the HOT and neutral wire for insertion.Bag came with 10 pcs, I have tried 2 and both worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Good price, good quality and easy to use.  Will buy again when the need come about and would recommend if you are looking for this type of jack.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for fat fingers like me!
Reviews.Author: J. Kar
Reviews.Content: This became a life saver when wiring in the O2 Cool fans to my 12v system.  Strip, tighten and done.  I went and added shrink tube to make it a little more long term, but really it didn't need it.

Reviews.Title: connecting new security cam to older wiring system
Reviews.Author: greygeek
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new security cam for an older security camera system.  The old power cable was a basic "bare wire" connection to 2 screw connections.  The new camera power connection was a very nice DC power adapter female jack.  This power adapter provided easy connect adapters to connect the old bare wires to the adapter, and a quick connection to the power connector on the camera.Not sure what I would have done if I hadn't located these adapters.  Changed a real problem into a 30 second solutions.

Reviews.Title: recommend - aaa
Reviews.Author: RoC
Reviews.Content: item is as described and as usual, works as it should and am satisfied and i recommend it to others

Reviews.Title: Makes my life easier
Reviews.Author: Michael L
Reviews.Content: I bought a pack of these for use in a mini casino that is attached to the bowling alley I work for and move/replace cameras somewhat frequently. I love these for setting up power cables and extensions.

Reviews.Title: Not Too Shabby
Reviews.Author: NoBS
Reviews.Content: These are very nice. I give them four stars, because one of them did not work. The screw assembly would not hold the positive wire in place. I tried too hard to salvage the piece and pushed too hard on the screw driver. Yes, I stabbed my middle finger with the screwdriver and returned the favor and flipped the thing off. It didn't care. I bought three bags of these and hope the rest are OK, but again, these are still very nice, even if one out of ten are defective.

Reviews.Title: Great Price Great Product
Reviews.Author: Darry T. Hayashi "DTin FL"
Reviews.Content: Great price and great product, just beware that there are different barrel diameters so match them up to the ones you need or have

Reviews.Title: Handy item.
Reviews.Author: Chad Fulkerson
Reviews.Content: What a great idea! I should have thought of this. An easy way to prep power wires from a previous install to accommodate the new cameras!

Reviews.Title: Well built
Reviews.Author: Powersat
Reviews.Content: Gino 10 Pcs 2.1x5.5mm Male Jack DC Power Adapter for CCTV CameraWell built, good price, will by again, recommend!

Reviews.Title: about for gino
Reviews.Author: Ngoc A.
Reviews.Content: It very good. I use it for correct adaptor.I need it in future and present.Thank you  help me when I need

Reviews.Title: no more look for right adapter
Reviews.Author: Larry Wade
Reviews.Content: I have look at other places for this adapter  when  I run wire for cameras and no one knew what I was looking for so when I saw these I feel like I found a gold mine.L.Wade

Reviews.Title: Not a quality item
Reviews.Author: The Count
Reviews.Content: Be happy you are getting 10 of these because in my batch 3 were no good. Be sure to check them out with a multimeter. Plus the eyelets are sometime too small and you can't get the wire in easily.

Reviews.Title: Power jack
Reviews.Author: Lubomyr Zyla
Reviews.Content: I needed this jack size but with a slightly thicker wire. This made soldering the wire in a traditional style jack difficult. In this jack the wires come in the back and are held in place with a screw clamp, similar to the way speaker wires are often secured. This new style of jack had no problem with a thicker gauge wire. The only problem I see with this jack is there is no strain relief in the plug itself. Pulling on the wire deliberately or accidentally may dislodge the wire leads and cause a short. A traditional Radio Shack style plug has a flexible wire cover which acts in a small way as strain relief. Interesting concept though.

Reviews.Title: makes mounting cameras much easier
Reviews.Author: Blackace04
Reviews.Content: use to connect camera/wires. makes adjusting much easier and swapping out defective cameras much quicker than crimping/cutting/soldering. Very happy with the build quality as well

Reviews.Title: Great for FPV Devices
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: This work great with FPV devices that use the standard Banana Plug. Easy to wire - no soldering required. I am using it with my EagleTree, Receivers and Monitor Power Supplies.

Reviews.Title: fast to install
Reviews.Author: cws
Reviews.Content: these help make fast installs or quick  repairs  no tape or wire nuttsto fiddle with this  is perfect for bthe 22 ga wirei would recomend to all techs

Reviews.Title: Jack/Plug was exactly
Reviews.Author: txguy5199
Reviews.Content: I purchased the jack/plug combo for extending the power adapter of a repeater (wireless radio system). Items worked as expected.

Reviews.Title: untinned cables have a tendency to short. beware ! ! !
Reviews.Author: bgoff_ak
Reviews.Content: These things are great for about 5 seconds, then they become dangerous. if you are using solid wire this will not apply to you, but those of us using multi-strand copper should head warning.  If the ends are untinned ( soldered ) your wire will eventually fray and poke out of the screw fitting. your fine strand wire now becomes a copper jumper and path of least resistance.... if your using low voltage power adapters the draw should not be enough to arc ( maybe ? ) but those pushing a few amps now have a simple but very effective ignitor some place in your attic.  this could have been avoided by extending the green plastic shielding  around the terminals, the only solution i have found is to tin the ends to avoid the stray strand ( I had one arc on me providing an exciting moment balancing on rafter beams... )

Reviews.Title: Very handy.
Reviews.Author: Woodlandsman "Woodlandsman"
Reviews.Content: Beats wrapping things in tape! Saves a lot of time. Looks better too. Buy more than you think you need, you'll use 'em.

Reviews.Title: They Fit
Reviews.Author: ClLy
Reviews.Content: I got these to wire up cameras for my vehicle for off road racing. These fit those little POV cameras (mostly reverse cameras. The only thing I could say would be better is a sealing boot on the wire end to add strain relief and water tightness for the connections.

Reviews.Title: These are great!
Reviews.Author: Harley Guy
Reviews.Content: These are as advertised, and priced right. I just threw them into my order to get the free shipping. I might be able to use them in the future, and that would just be a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy adapters for your 2.1/5.5mm-plug needs.
Reviews.Author: A. M. White "Just a regular person."
Reviews.Content: This is a great adapter if you need to make quick and easy connections for 2.1mm ID / 5.5mm OD plugs. The screw-down clamps make quite a secure connection, but be careful not to overdrive the screws. One of the 10 pieces had a faulty screw clamp - it wouldn't seat correctly even after I stripped it down, but not a big deal. I use these to test out RC FPV circuits and once I'm happy with the layout, I replace these with soldered connections. For applications that are not critical, you could probably get away with using these adapters permanently.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Venom
Reviews.Content: Worked exactly as advertised. No problems with this item at all, I would recommend this item. Not much else I can say....

Reviews.Title: No more twisted wires
Reviews.Author: KH
Reviews.Content: Positive connections and fast. Time is money and these are quick and reliable. About time to order more. I won't use what comes with the cameras.

Reviews.Title: replacement parts
Reviews.Author: Boat
Reviews.Content: I have yet to use these in my system, but bought them as replacement parts should the need arise.  Will write more if there is a cause to, but for now a solid purchase for the money.

Reviews.Title: I love this design.
Reviews.Author: Nghiep Le
Reviews.Content: Very reliable product. Easy to connect . I am very please with this design. I use it everyday and perfect fit.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use.
Reviews.Author: J. CHITKARA "JC"
Reviews.Content: Works perfect. Excellent Quality. Cheap and best. Easy to use. Easy for any Layman too.  I do not like working with electrical stuff since its dangerous. but this was simple and easy. Reordered it too for more.

Reviews.Title: Simplify your CCTV installations.
Reviews.Author: ZechariahB
Reviews.Content: Simplify your CCTV installations with Siamese cable and the Gino 5.5mm male jack to connect the camera to a power source.  Simple TB screw lock for power wires.

Reviews.Title: Perfect connectors, just what you need
Reviews.Author: Jim Law
Reviews.Content: Great little connectors.  Get the other gender to make quick disconnect harnesses.  I use these with the LED Strip lights and the 12V power supply sold on here.

Reviews.Title: Not Great
Reviews.Author: J. Fasceski "lcpljoe"
Reviews.Content: Couldn't get most of them to work  - seems they are very particular to connection technique or just drop a lot of signal under ordinal circumstances!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for running security cameras!
Reviews.Author: ahoffoss
Reviews.Content: For years, I'd been splicing to the included wires.  With this product, there's no splicing necessary!  Just run a simple 16/2 wire and attach at both ends!  Perfect!  Makes for super easy PREwiring!

Reviews.Title: Multi-use accessories
Reviews.Author: Cuffy
Reviews.Content: I purchased these and the female counterparts from Gino and they're great and simple to work with!  Gino has scads of helpful accessories!  Mine are for 18-24 gauge wires, but they will fit up to about 12 gauge, I believe ... low voltage!  My purpose is for use in a video surveillance system.  The screw-clamp connections make working with these fine wires a snap!  I also have a couple of hobby applications I will use them for ... fixing broken wiring on holiday decoratives to power them.  Handy to have and could even be a mini-audio connector.

Reviews.Title: Purchase was a no brainer
Reviews.Author: Joe Hyland
Reviews.Content: When ever one can make an installation go faster.Time is money...I am so glad I purchased these screw terminal adapters because I did not need to solder anything..I am not saying the screw termination is better than soldering it is just faster...

Reviews.Title: adapter for cameras
Reviews.Author: joann brase
Reviews.Content: these adapter worked great for our new cameras, pat had no trouble at all connecting them to the wiring thank you

Reviews.Title: Great time saving device
Reviews.Author: Jeff Corey
Reviews.Content: this is a excellent product. it makes connecting cat 6 quick easy and solid no soldering or punch down required.

Reviews.Title: Gino male DC power jack
Reviews.Author: Edgar D.
Reviews.Content: This our second  order for these connectors.  We have used these for two years in a church surveillance system  and they  have been dependable.  Easy to wire and allow us flexability in locating our  cameras. Recommend to anyone using a cctv system.

Reviews.Title: Versatile
Reviews.Author: P. Hang
Reviews.Content: Works on DLink internet camera (same size connector plug) where I needed to extend the power cable feed.  Polarity (+/-) is clearly marked.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: AD
Reviews.Content: pros: Properly labeled, fits the LED controllers, quality seems sufficientcons: wish wire insertion hole was inset a bit further in

Reviews.Title: Do not buy these
Reviews.Author: M. Stone
Reviews.Content: I would not buy these again.  So far two of the ten were bad.  If you buy them use an ohm meter to test them.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed, didn't want to solder.
Reviews.Author: Rich M821
Reviews.Content: I needed a few of these jacks to hook up to a external power supply. #14 wires fit real nice, holding screws were perfect, not tight or stiff.

Reviews.Title: Good Idea
Reviews.Author: Cletu
Reviews.Content: These are great for modifying power inputs, good quality product could save you a lot of money on cables, I would recommend buying both male & female.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: BobL
Reviews.Content: I bought a few 10 packs of these to use in my camera installation for power connections of the siamese coax power conductors to plug into the cameras. worked out very well, and made the job easy. All my outdoor cameras connect ot their cables with a PVC junction box, so these are out of the weather and should last a very long time.

Reviews.Title: Easy and cheap way to run power for CCTV cameras and other low-voltage devices
Reviews.Author: igen "igen"
Reviews.Content: This 2.1x5.5mm male adapter mates with B005CMP434Loosen the screws, push in the wires, and tighten the screws--it couldn't be easier.  I'm using these with CAT5 to deliver power to 12V CCTV and IP cameras.  Both adapters have the center pin marked as positive (+), so as long as you wire them the same on both ends of the cable, you don't need to worry about frying anything.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: blurb
Reviews.Content: Must have if your doing any kind of security camera work, very well built, terminals well built, good product, would recommed

Reviews.Title: ginotastic
Reviews.Author: ERIKA SHEAHAN
Reviews.Content: great products would by again and recommend to anyone so far i am happy with my purchase nicely designed product

Reviews.Title: Gino 10pc DC adapter
Reviews.Author: OneBigBuckeye
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  I've used 5 and all have worked just fine.  Quality is OK.  There's nothing fancy about these.  I don't have anything to compare against.  First time using this type of product.  I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Better late than never
Reviews.Author: sylvester n.
Reviews.Content: These were exactly what I needed but were very late getting to me. I had a timeline and almost did not meet it

Reviews.Title: Good for my project
Reviews.Author: Daniel Johnston
Reviews.Content: I bought this 10 pack just for one of them, but for the price I was willing to buy them all and not really bat and eye. They are really nice with a tiny screw area that holds the raw wires in so there is no need for solder.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: bay
Reviews.Content: I used 7 of these to power my drapes motors. Overall Quality is good and the screw terminals are good quality. Accepts AWG 14 and several 16. Will buy again

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Celson Hubner Junior
Reviews.Content: I look by internet in site amazon.I  by for me and my son.I recommended For every oneThe price is very good

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: jrod
Reviews.Content: I used these on my outdoor security cameras and they do the job. About my only suggestion is that they add some type of weather-proof boot to protect the contacts. I used marine quality heat shrink tubing to seal the connections and prevent and damage from the elements

Reviews.Title: Great product excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Vegas052
Reviews.Content: Great product excellent performance on my security camera i recommend this product to any person looking for power supply for your camera connector and siamese security cable thank you

Reviews.Title: These are the solution that works for power from twin lead for your camera installs.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: These are the solution that works for power from twin lead for your camera installs. Purchased these for camera install/upgrade and sure helps rather then soldering while on a ladder 18 feet in the air just strip wires and screw in to place then plug in to cameras power socket. Reminder to wrap with electrical tape if using where exposed to rain or wet also a zero di-electric silicone grease in and around the metal contact surfaces is a big help for anti-corrosion as well.

Reviews.Title: Does Its Job
Reviews.Author: 808 Coug
Reviews.Content: Easy to install & worked well.  I gave it four stars because two out of two packs of ten were defective.

Reviews.Title: Work well!
Reviews.Author: BK63 "bklosens"
Reviews.Content: These work well on the power end of your camera vs the pigtail type connector with wires.  Just strip back the wire and put them in the screw down terminals and your camera is ready.

Reviews.Title: Work well and are cheap.
Reviews.Author: Steve C
Reviews.Content: These are $1.00 at the swapmeet and just $0.50 here so that's a pretty good savings and they work just the same. The quality of the ones I got seems to be OK. I would recommend giving them a squirt of WD-40 and cleaning the barrel before connecting them though. They are connectors, what more can you say.

Reviews.Title: Fills a need
Reviews.Author: CoastalQ
Reviews.Content: We do low voltage LED lighting and this, with the female counterpart, makes connecting random lights much easier. A much better solution than auto type connectors and it is compatible with the connectors that many 12/24V LED lighting components use like power supplies and dimmers. The pinch type wire clamps are vastly superior to screw posts or one time crimp connections. Seems well built and easily reusable.

Reviews.Title: Security System
Reviews.Author: Jason Lee "Lt  Redneck"
Reviews.Content: I purchased these while installing a Security Camera system at the College I attend. They are solid connectors and got us out of a pinch with a fast approaching deadline.  This is very easy to use and anyone with the tools can install these.

Reviews.Title: nice tight fit locking screws grab well
Reviews.Author: wny-rider
Reviews.Content: We used these to connect to some LED lights that had the female connector on them. They fit snugly and seem sturdy.Amazon Prime had them to us in 2 days at a great price.

Reviews.Title: 2.1x5.5mm Male Jack
Reviews.Author: Lee S.
Reviews.Content: The item works well and so far appears to be durable in the application or setup I am using them.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes, nothing else will do.
Reviews.Author: Gary Vukovic
Reviews.Content: Sometimes you have to improvise.They all work, and saved my life!Great price and fast service.Yes - I'd recommend them to everyone.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: johnfarcas
Reviews.Content: hooked it up and it works great ..deffiniety worth the money  spent on the items I didn't wait that long either ...good product

Reviews.Title: great utility

Reviews.Content: Great utility for quick repairs in DC chargers and transformers, where it is difficult to repair by welding or have a finish Cadre, they are robust and easy to use, especially for my experiments with DC current

Reviews.Content: These along with several other electronic adapter products helped complete a security camera surveilance system.  They worked flawlessly.  Great product, highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: good quality power adapter for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Morgan "CPNTECH"
Reviews.Content: good quality power adapter for the price. It is easy to use works fantastic. i had no problems whit it at all I  do recommend this system.

Reviews.Content: its just works perfectly for me and do whats supposed to do , i use it with CAT5 cable and work like charm

Reviews.Title: Nice easy to install and it does what is supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: JX
Reviews.Content: Nice easy to install and it does what is supposed to do. I recommend it.This is just to fulfill the minimum words required for the review.

Reviews.Title: Quicker install than the pigtail connector
Reviews.Author: SW
Reviews.Content: Simple and clean install on my CCTV system.  Insert stripped wires, tighten screw, plug in connector.  Much quicker and cleaner to install than having to wire nut and/or solder the provided camera power pigtails to the siamese cable. They are reasonably priced and very effective.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product / Fast Shipping / Good Price
Reviews.Author: Mike S. "FSOfficer"
Reviews.Content: These couldn't be any easier to use with Cat 5 cable.  Good construction/quality for the money.  They were received fast and allowed me to complete the cameras that were further than the factory supplied cable could reach.

Reviews.Title: worked fine!
Reviews.Author: Deal-N-Dave
Reviews.Content: I used these connectors to join several led light strips to illuminate my gun safe, they worked fine and saved a lot of tedious soldering!

Reviews.Title: Works as intended.
Reviews.Author: Rolaids0
Reviews.Content: I used these with a camera system (cameras and illumination) along with an Access Point (NetGear), and a switch (also NetGear.) Everything is powered by a 10Amp 12V power supply.

Reviews.Title: Very convenient
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: these things are great if you are not very good a soldering small wires.  Screw clamps the wire.  Voila!  These are a common wall wart power source size.  Bulkier than if you used a soldered version but ...  There is a female version also. I wish they were available in all the different barrel connector sizes/configurations.

Reviews.Title: Little Helper
Reviews.Author: El Malo
Reviews.Content: This connectors make a profesional termination in any job they're used. Forget about splicing wires. Just connect one of these at the end of your wire and you are done. I recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: THESE ARE GREAT
Reviews.Author: Bobby Button
Reviews.Content: For adding a connector to a security camera's DC cable, this item is perfect. Simple and easy to install. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: exactly what i was looking for...
Reviews.Author: yazan daas
Reviews.Content: Recommend those adapters if ur looking for secured/clean work (NO BLACK TAPPING) LOL . . . . . . .

Reviews.Author: alex Dahik
Reviews.Content: This guys are perfect for any camera surveillance installation they will save you sooo much money and it will let you have a really clean installation

Reviews.Title: great for professional install
Reviews.Author: Ace.C
Reviews.Content: These are great for the professional installer. Yes you don't have to use them, you can just splice your connections. However, these give you an easy way to replace the cameras if necessary and a clear installation. And for only 5-10 dollars. ..its worth it

Reviews.Title: good price, works
Reviews.Author: Aaron L. Dunphy
Reviews.Content: Good for the price.  I'd suggest using heat shrink or other way of sealing if using outdoors since there is no protection of the connections.

Reviews.Title: It works

Reviews.Content: Good item it works! What else can I say about a connector.This is just to fulfill the minimum words required for the review

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: B. Knott
Reviews.Content: Great adapter. cost effective worked great and was easy to install with little or no effort.  Good prod uct .

Reviews.Title: great for temporary connections
Reviews.Author: pdv
Reviews.Content: If you're not so smart with soldering this is the ideal solution. I am one of those, it changed my life in better!

Reviews.Title: Great for the cost
Reviews.Author: Arsen1
Reviews.Content: These are well made connectors.The price is very reasonable, I ended up with more than I needed but when is that a bad thing...

Reviews.Title: Very well made adapter
Reviews.Author: Dr. Dave "Dr. Dave"
Reviews.Content: This product is well constructed with the best materials and excellent workmanship.This is a recommended product for you to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Daddy Data
Reviews.Content: Solves a wiring issue cost effectively. Good vendor , good price point. No problem recommending this vendor.  Happy i found this product

Reviews.Title: I ordered I got
Reviews.Author: appcojoe
Reviews.Content: Came quick and as ordered, happy with the product. They are very handy for hookup so you do not have to buy the wire sets

Reviews.Title: Seem Nice.
Reviews.Author: Justa Guy "Just a Guy"
Reviews.Content: I bought these because Amazon recommended I get them to go along with my new IP security cameras.  Unfortunately they are the wrong size.  They seem well made, but take note, they will not work with wansview or agassio cameras.  I won't knock them for my laziness, just beware amazon's recommendations aren't always a good idea.

Reviews.Title: Power Adapters
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: These work well for providing power via cat5e date cable to my outbuiding. It allows me to use cameras where there are no AC outlets. Purchased thru Amamax - Amazon Marketplace.

Reviews.Title: The best adapter to use.
Reviews.Author: Ray562
Reviews.Content: This is the way to go when running new cable for home security cameras.Very easy to use and I havent found anything better to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Jacks
Reviews.Author: A. J. Richter "Seeker's Quest"
Reviews.Content: I purchased these Male Power Jacks for their ease of Wiring, NO Solder needed, No Fumes to breath in, Just Simple Screws & Wire.One Suggestion; If your Cables/Power Harness is going to be exposed to the weather, Try coating the Jack with, " Liquid Tape or Liquid Dip-it, plastic coating", this gives an easily removable coating that protects the unions from the weather.I Used most of the Order just Fixing Many of my old Transformers that had Faulty plugs, So I'll be reordering more soon.I would Recommend these Plugs & The Company that sells them to Everyone, Their Just Great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent connectors
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: These work great for making camera power cables. They are even marked so you don't have to guess which is positive or negative.

Reviews.Title: excellant male power adpter
Reviews.Author: freddie gregory
Reviews.Content: excellant male power adpter for video surveliance camera has well marked negative and positive leads for positive side and negative side of wire feed and an excellant male jack  that fits well with the female port

Reviews.Title: Perfect for CCTV Camera Power
Reviews.Author: Don Lewis
Reviews.Content: Unlike another reviewer I did not find that the polarity indicators on the units were reversed. Straight forward product at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: As expected.  The polarity is correct.
Reviews.Author: David C. Filmer "David Filmer"
Reviews.Content: These worked just fine to hook up a tracking telescope.  Another reviewer noted that the polarity was non-conventional; I did not find this to be the case.  The "-" (negative) terminal goes to the outside of the barrel, which is the usual convention.  I verified this with my multimeter before wiring up the power cable, and it works fine for my telescope.

Reviews.Title: i like
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: These are very nice connectors.They seem very well made and are easy to use.You can use them for most any low power, low voltage application.

Reviews.Title: NEDED THESE TO CONVER CAMERA POWER
Reviews.Author: rjw2256
Reviews.Content: GAVE IT A SHOT AND WORKS GREAT .......FAST SHIPPING AND FITS CAMERA FOR THE POWER CORD  WILL PURCHASE AGAIN IF I NEED MORE THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: cory 1
Reviews.Author: gaston222
Reviews.Content: Worked beautiful, no problem and the price was right, I will recommend this product to my friends and family all the time

Reviews.Title: Shoddy construction
Reviews.Author: Blazes Boylan
Reviews.Content: About half of the adapters I received didn't work--one of the slots was too shallow to accept the wire.  This is bad news when you're standing on a ladder in the cold trying to complete a connection.  Don't bother with these.

Reviews.Title: Work perfectly
Reviews.Author: BeckwithTech
Reviews.Content: I love these! They make my installs look really clean. Very easy to use when you up on a ladder. Second time I purchased these for a security camera install. I will be purchasing more of them when I do my next install.

Reviews.Title: It works - polarity reversed though
Reviews.Author: Big Ed
Reviews.Content: I bought a 10 pack of these and they do work but the polarity is reversed.  If you follow the markings on the terminal the inside will be negative and the outside will be positive, not a big deal, just an extra step to correct.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: M. Orr
Reviews.Content: I bought a bag of these and I am very pleased. They work well.I have to write a 20 word review on a simple little connector. Really ?I am not sure what else to say. I am happy with them, they work fine.

Reviews.Title: Easy Day
Reviews.Author: V-ret
Reviews.Content: I bought these because I was lazy and didn't want to bother with soldering wires.  kill me, lol.  But these things work great.  I used them to connect my power supply, control box, and refrigerator switch all togerther for my safe.  Works great.

Reviews.Title: They work but....
Reviews.Author: Jj
Reviews.Content: These connectors all worked but I was disappointed with some of the quality control, some of the connectors had bent plastic pieces that looked like they had been melted or something. I think out of the 10 pc bag maybe 3 or 4 had issues although all of them worked without any problems they just looked like crap. If I purchase anymore I will probably just go with a different company don't want to burn down my house for a few dollars.

Reviews.Title: Male Power Adapter
Reviews.Author: Carl Turek
Reviews.Content: These came ten in a pack. Two had so much corrosion on the metal parts they were unusable. Another was defective as there was no internal connection from the screw terminal to the tip. The rest I was able to clean off the minor corrosion with contact cleaner and a wire wheel to make them usable. I would not recommend these to others.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: S.D.M.F "Bleed Black Label"
Reviews.Content: several did not work...don't waste your money...others are available for a few dollars more, that work just fine...

Reviews.Title: who orded this
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: i dont even have this thing and thay want me to review this product, ok here goes if i needed this addapter i would probably get it and it probably would not work like 50 percent of them dont, thair you go amazon thair is my review.

ProductInfo.Features:

Connectors: DC 2.1 x 5.5mm male, "+" "-" terminal interface.
Use for CCTV Camera power supply.
Each Dimension: 3.8 x 1.4 x 1.3cm/ 1.5" x 0.55" x 0.5" (L*W*H). Color: Silver Tone, Black, Green.
niceEhop quality warranty and brand new items.
ProductInfo.Name: niceEshop 10 Pcs 2.1x5.5mm Male Jack DC Power Adapter for CCTV Camera
